title: Magic to the Bone
description: Boss Fight: Samir! Roll for initiative...Bruised, battered, but not even close to broken, Jade and her friends must reunite, and get ready to take out her psycho ex once and for all. Leveled up and wiser, Jade stands a chance this time. As long as she takes out Samir BEFORE he turns into a god...This is book seven in USA Today bestselling The Twenty-Sided Sorceress urban fantasy series.
author: Annie Bellet
